FAQ

The answers to the most popular frequent questions

Can't find your answer? Send us an email and we will get back to you.

  • Troisieme Oeil uses Slack for project management, ensuring a swift communication and collaboration.
  • Expect the initial concept within 2-3 days, and Troisieme Oeil will make revisions until it meets your complete satisfaction. For bigger projects it can take up to 4 weeks.
  • Troisieme Oeil believes in providing the best possible service to clients, and to ensure that, we have decided to limit the workload to just two projects at a time. This approach allows Troisieme Oeil to dedicate its full attention and expertise to each project, ensuring quality and timely delivery.
  • Definitely! Troisieme Oeil specialize in delivering long-lasting project management solutions that are built to endure. Our approach ensures sustainability and adaptability to guarantee success over the long term.
  • Yes, we offer both free training sessions and a detailed documentation to ensure smooth usage of our software.

    This includes a detailed report that covers installation, configuration, usage instructions, troubleshooting tips, and more, to assist users in navigating the software with ease.
